document_name: Supreme Decree No. 2.858 on responding to adverse events hitting the agricultural sector
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/BOL/2016/BOL-2016-02-08-Supreme Decree No. 2.858 on responding to adverse events hitting the agricultural sector_2a37c7f4a1ee9c762626233a7685806e.pdf
document_description: This Supreme Decree establishes the requirements and defines the procedure for the presentation and consideration of reprogramming requirements of credit operations with the financial system of the agricultural sector affected by adverse events. It is understood as adverse events to droughts, floods, frost, hailstorms, snowfalls, pests and diseases that have affected the agricultural sector.
